com.topcoder.util.format
Interface PrimitiveFormatter

public interface PrimitiveFormatter

A formatter for primitive types. Instances of PrimitiveFormatter are usually created using a factory method from PrimitiveFormatterFactory.

Version:
1.0
Author:
KurtSteinkraus
